title: Auth Log Recovery
description:
After the breach, the auth.log file was wiped to hide tampering.

Objective: Recover deleted '/var/log/auth.log' entries using extundelete or TestDisk, then validate their integrity.
dialogue: Mira: "Without auth logs, I can't see who logged in during the attack."
Mira: "Can you help me recover deleted log entries and check their integrity?"
hints: Use file-recovery tools to undelete log entries from the disk.
